title: Add sizeInBytes to Suggester.Lookup
description: It would be nice to have a sizeInBytes() method added to Suggester.Lookup interface. This would allow users to estimate the size of the in-memory data structure created by various suggester implementation.

comments.content: Initial patch implementing sizeInBytes() for Suggest.Lookup.
